recipesJson.name: Strawberry Kiwi Kwiki Kustard
recipesJson.author: Freshepies
recipesJson.description:
The kiwi can be overwhelming for a days, at three days this turns into a sweet and tart rich custard.

To quote Gizzard Stew,  "Magical!"

Max VG, sweeten to taste.

reviews.text: Didn’t realize this was here until I saw it on TheFogVlog show.  It’s a strawberry twist on addy’s custard, which is iconic and delicious.  So smooth and well balanced. A must mix recipe for sure!
HOW IS NOBODY TALKING ABOUT THIS RECIPE - its total fire, even off the shake. Two layers, perfect sweetness. Silky smooth... YUM
